ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Rowdy Wolf: This is bizare, Rowdy wolf said to himself. Zyber, his mind repeated from the wolf. Should he respond? And how could this wolf talk? I am Rowdy

Rowdy Wolf:






This is bizare, Rowdy wolf said to himself. Zyber, his mind repeated from 
the wolf. Should he respond? And how could this wolf talk?
"I am Rowdy Wolf!" he called back, his voice a little quivery from his 
surprise. "What...what brings you here, she-wolf?" Should he ask why she was 
able to talk?
